ELIZA1.original: ~s~Take down the ~r~last man ~s~before he makes a getaway in the van.
ELIZA1.translated: ~s~在~r~最后一个人~s~开货车逃走之前干掉他。

ELIZA1.original: ~s~Protect Packie.
~s~Hold ~INPUT_AIM~ to look through the scope of the rifle, when it is equipped.
~s~Make your way to the ~y~vantage point.
~r~ Packie was injured. You failed to protect him.~s~
~s~Press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to fire.
~r~ One of the attackers got away.~s~
~s~Take out all of the ~r~attackers.
~s~Lose your wanted level.~s~
~s~Go to the ~y~building~s~ in South Bohan.
~s~Use ~PAD_LSTICK_UP~ to zoom in. ~s~Use ~PAD_LSTICK_DOWN~ to zoom out.
~r~ The meeting has been cancelled. Don't break up the meeting when you don't have to.~s~
ELIZA1.translated: ~r~会面取消了，不要自作主张打断会面。~s~

ELIZA1.original: Packie and his associate have arrived. Watch over the meeting with the sniper rifle.
ELIZA1.translated: Packie和他的同伙已经到场。用狙击步枪监视会面。

ELIZA1.original: ~s~Shoot through the windshield to hit the driver.
~s~Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to aim.
~s~Use ~INPUT_SNIPER_ZOOM_OUT~ to zoom out.
~s~Use ~INPUT_SNIPER_ZOOM_IN~ to zoom in. ~s~Use ~INPUT_SNIPER_ZOOM_OUT~ to zoom out.
~s~Press ~PAD_LB~ or ~PAD_B~ to fire.
~s~Use ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ to aim.
~s~Watch over the meeting.
~s~When crouching, the accuracy of the rifle increases.
ELIZA1.translated: ~s~蹲下时，狙击步枪的射击精度将会提高。

ELIZA1.original: ~s~Use ~INPUT_SNIPER_ZOOM_IN_ALTERNATE~ to zoom in. ~s~Use ~INPUT_SNIPER_ZOOM_OUT_ALTERNATE~ to zoom out.
~b~Packie~s~ is in trouble find him and help him.
~s~Go to the roof and pick up the ~g~sniper rifle.
~s~Hold ~PAD_RB~ to look through scope of the rifle when it is equipped.
~s~Use ~INPUT_AIM~ to look through the scope of the rifle, when it is equipped.
